document.full_text: the chief executive of verizon wireless said he has no interest in buying sprint nextel corp  even as the company stands to lose its top position in the u.s. wireless market because of a merger between at&t inc  and t-mobile usa.
document.title: verizon wireless ceo says no interest in sprint deal
lines_and_colors: the chief executive of verizon wireless said he has no interest in buying sprint nextel corp  even as the company stands to lose its top position in the u.s. wireless market because of a merger between at&t inc  and t-mobile usa.
